import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Register (props) { const [email, setEmail] = React.useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = React.useState(''); function handleEmailChange (e) { const {name, value} = e.target setEmail({[name]: value}) } function handlePasswordChange (e) { const {name, value} = e.target setPassword({[name]: value}) } function handleSubmit (e) { e.preventDefault() props.onRegister({email, password}) } return (
